reviewText: a wonderful compilation of ASL storytelling, poetry and songs! some poignant, some humorous. i already am looking forward to the next DVD! highly recommended to anybody with a love of american sign language.
I love this DVD.. it is well organized and easy to follow.  It even include captions!  Two thumbs up.  A must buy!

Thank you, Amazon for shipping my order to my home.
I will watch the DVD soon when I can.  I know her dad from
my high school. May God bless her and her family.

Rosa Lee in GREATE, funny and easy to understand. Worth it
The only problem for me is that I bought this DVD to learn ASL, ans since there is no sound, It's quite hard to read and watch the signs at the same time.
Other than that, I recommend it
She can be hilarious and at the same time taught us something... a subtle moral lesson without being preachy... you think for yourself!!
Rosa Lee is a natural and does a remarkable job of truly representing the language of deaf and hard of hearing Americans.

This is a wonderful DVD.  Rosa Lee is a wonderful storyteller.  Her storytelling is very entertaining.  It makes me even more excited to learn the beautiful ASL language.  This DVD is a must have for all.

I am learning sign language and find this DVD not only interesting and funny but a great help to me in learning this new skill, signing ASL. Rosa Lee is wonderful and the DVD is beautifully put together.  I would highly recommend this DVD for the shear beauty of the language and the wonderfully talented performer, Rosa Lee.
The Rosa Lee Show (2004-2008): American Sign Language (ASL) Storytelling, Video, Poetry, & Music
